name: Skopós

biography.description: Skopós deploys V10 Pantheon Shells, a pair of AI-controlled flying cameras that scan for attackers and can anchor to surfaces to provide expanded surveillance coverage.

gameplayTips: Position your V10 Pantheon Shells to monitor key entry points and flanks.
Use the shells to gather intel on attacker positions and movements.
Remember that anchored shells provide wider scanning coverage but are more visible.
Coordinate intel with roamers to set up flanks and traps for attackers.
